effect.name: Basic Drop-Shadow
effect.description: Adds a displaced silhouette behind an entity.

parameter.name: Drop-Shadow Intensity
parameter.description: The opacity of the drop shadow. (255 = opaque, 0 = clear)

parameter.name: X Displacement
parameter.description: The X displacement of the drop shadow.

parameter.name: Y Displacement
parameter.description: The Y displacement of the drop shadow.
